00009 extern double gsl_nf_integral(WhitFunc*,int,double,double);

00018 class NFIntegral {
00019  public:
00023   NFIntegral(PPair* pPair) {
00024     whitfunc_ = new WhitFunc(pPair);
00025     chanrad_ = pPair->GetChRad();
00026     total_sep_e_ = pPair->GetSepE()+pPair->GetExE();
00027   };
00031   ~NFIntegral() {
00032     delete whitfunc_;
00033   };
00039   double operator()(int lFinal,double levelEnergy) const {
00040     return gsl_nf_integral(whitfunction(),lFinal,fabs(levelEnergy-TotalSepE()),ChanRad());
00041   };
00045   WhitFunc *whitfunction() const {return whitfunc_;};
00049   double ChanRad() const {return chanrad_;};
00053   double TotalSepE() const {return total_sep_e_;};
00054  private:
00055   WhitFunc *whitfunc_;
00056   double chanrad_;
00057   double total_sep_e_;
00058 };
